summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Ayvant IT & Cybersecurity website with GHL integrations and 10 location-based SEO pages. All major features tested successfully including chat widget, contact forms, newsletter form, client portal link, and location pages.
passed_tests: GHL chat widget loads on all pages (homepage, cybersecurity, IT support, about, location pages)
GHL contact form displays correctly on Contact page with proper iframe integration
GHL newsletter form displays in footer with correct source URL
Client Portal link works with correct URL (https://ayvant-ca.app.clientclub.net/) and security attributes
Phone number (604) 239-2090 displayed correctly across multiple locations
Email hello@ayvant.ca displayed correctly across multiple locations
Both office addresses (Langley: 20627 Fraser Hwy, Surrey: 2677 192 St. Suite 102) shown in footer and contact page
Location pages have unique content for each city with proper SEO targeting
Location pages show Law Firms & Accountants focus with dedicated sections
Location pages interlink to other service areas in 'We Also Serve' section
Footer shows all service area links (found 5/5 tested links)
Mobile responsiveness works correctly with mobile menu functionality
Page title is correct and SEO-optimized
Contact information consistency across all pages
